attributes.action: Jared O'Mara to resign as MP for Sheffield Hallam.
attributes.additional_details:
Telegraph - Sexist Comments: 
http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2017/10/24/jared-omara-refuses-resign-sexist-comments-suggests-conservatives/

Guido Fawkes - Racism: 
https://order-order.com/2017/10/24/jared-spanish-dagos-danes-pig-shaggers/

BBC News - Abusive Comments:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/av/uk-politics-41736551/what-future-mp-jared-o-mara-told-sophie-evans-earlier-in-2017

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-south-yorkshire-41724540
attributes.background: The MP for Sheffield Hallam has proved to be a sexist, racist and misogynistic person who is no longer fit to serve his constituents. I am urging you to sign this petition in order to trigger a By-Election in the constituency of Sheffield Hallam to vote in a new MP that is a person of the people.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
